W

WelcomeView - Class in view
All the UI related to Welcome View, This is starting UI, which calls other Views
WelcomeView(GameController, Stage, RWMapFileController, MapEditorView) - Constructor for class view.WelcomeView
Constructor which injects Controllers and View
WindowManager - Class in view
 
WindowManager() - Constructor for class view.WindowManager
 
write() - Method in class model.mapio.WriteMap
This method converts MapDataBase.continents to .map file write a new map at #outputPath from MapDataBase
WriteController - Class in controller
Controls Write operations on MapDataBase In order to do Add a country Delete a country Delete a continent Add a continent Add adjacent territories call the methods in this class
WriteController(DataWriter) - Constructor for class controller.WriteController
Constructor to initializes WriteController.dataWriter
WriteControllerTest - Class in controller
 
WriteControllerTest() - Constructor for class controller.WriteControllerTest
 
writeMap(File) - Method in class controller.RWMapFileController
This method writes the edited map to the location passed
WriteMap - Class in model.mapio
Write a new map to specified #outputPath
WriteMap(File) - Constructor for class model.mapio.WriteMap
Constructor that initializes the WriteMap.outputPath
writenewContinent(String) - Method in class controller.WriteController
Writes new continent to map
writenewContinentTest() - Method in class controller.WriteControllerTest
Writes new continent to map
